text: Dva molodykh lyudey buly u tyurmi z nym. Odyn z nykh skazanoho, "ya dyvyvsya (u moyiy mriyi) shcho ya robyv vyno," ta inshyy skazanyy, "ya dyvyvsya sebe khlib perenesennya na moyiy holovi, z kotroyi ptakhy hostylysya. Poinformuyte nas interpretatsiyi tsykh sniv. My dyvymos π shcho vy ye spravedlyvi
